This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=admin-staff.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-02-24T16:13:04Z Kimberley Hulme 2015-02-24T16:12:59+00:00 2015-02-24T16:12:59+00:00 Short course at Queen Mary University of London: Statistics for University Administrators presented by the SSC on 18 June 2015 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;cedf6314.1502 We are announcing the following 1-day short course, which is scheduled to take place on 18 June 2015 at Queen Mary University of London. Summary information is given below. For more detailed information and registration forms please see http://www.reading.ac.uk/ssc/, or email statistics-courses@lists.reading.ac.uk<mailto:statistics-courses@lists.reading.ac.uk>.<br><br>******Please email us if your institution might be interested in hosting public courses****** [...] Martin Loftus 2015-02-18T16:54:56+00:00 2015-02-18T16:54:56+00:00 Re: Decentralising card collection at enrolment https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;5b53004.1502 Hello We took the first steps last year. We enrolled the majority as you described below, but we allowed different groups to enrol off-site. For example, students who moved into halls at the weekend before the start of term were able to pick up their cards (which they also use as door keys) and were able to fully enrol there and then. It was successful, and they were pleased to enrol early. To allow this to happen we created a simple web process that non-registry staff could use that required no intervention. They swiped the card which either fully enrolled [...] Claire Cuvier 2015-02-12T11:56:00+00:00 2015-02-12T11:56:00+00:00 Decentralising card collection at enrolment https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;e722d9ff.1502 Hello,<br><br>I would be grateful if you would share your experiences of enrolment and if you have thought of, or have already decentralised the card collection process for non-International students.<br><br>Currently we ask students to enrol on-line and they are then required to attend an enrolment event where we check their personal details, qualifications, ID and give them a student card. [...] Sarah Mumby 2015-02-02T17:01:15+00:00 2015-02-02T17:01:15+00:00 Re: Study abroad credits - how do you count them? https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;d6697a98.1502 Thanks Shelly<br>Yes we do the same, but I am struggling on how to record the modules they have taken in Hamburg on our system as they are different to the ones they should have taken here.<br><br>I was wanting to show them a one bulk RPL e.g RPL 60 credits (30 ECTs) credit transfer from Hamburg University. [...] Sarah Mumby 2015-02-02T16:12:31+00:00 2015-02-02T16:12:31+00:00 Study abroad credits - how do you count them? https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;dcc1c24d.1502 Dear all<br>We are sending our first group of study abroad students out in semester to the EU.<br><br>Please can you give me feedback as to how you count the ECTs credit. Do you RPCL the credits in? do you use numeric marks? If so how do these appear on your HEAR/transcripts? [...] Kimberley Hulme 2015-01-23T15:18:59+00:00 2015-01-23T15:18:59+00:00 Short Course: Statistics for University Administrators (Venue: SOAS, University of London) https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;2be5aae1.1501 Please note this course is taking place as planned...<br><br>We are re-announcing the following 1-day short course, which is scheduled to take place on 12 February 2015 at SOAS, University of London. Summary information is given below. For more detailed information and registration forms please see http://www.reading.ac.uk/ssc/, or email statistics-courses@lists.reading.ac.uk<mailto:statistics-courses@lists.reading.ac.uk>.<br><br>Note<br>******All of our courses include hands-on computer practical work***** [...] Kimberley Hulme 2014-12-15T16:47:00+00:00 2014-12-15T16:47:00+00:00 Statistics for University Administrators- 1 day course by the SSC! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;f3125878.1412 We are re-announcing the following 1-day short course, which is scheduled to take place on 12 February 2015 at SOAS, University of London. Summary information is given below. For more detailed information and registration forms please see http://www.reading.ac.uk/ssc/, or email statistics-courses@lists.reading.ac.uk.<br><br>Note<br>******All of our courses include hands-on computer practical work*****<br><br>Statistics for University Administrators. Venue: SOAS, University of London (Russell Square campus) -> 12 February 2015. Price: 355 GBP (an academic discount is available - terms and conditions apply).<br>View: http://www.reading.ac.uk/ssc/n/Short%20Courses/statsuniadm.htm [...] George Allison 2014-12-01T10:56:51+00:00 2014-12-01T10:56:51+00:00 APL policies https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;597db91e.1412 Dear colleagues,<br><br>I am finally getting stuck into updating our APL policies at the moment at<br>Portsmouth and am looking at a couple of areas in particular:<br><br>1. the maximum amount of APL allowable for each award (in particular<br>topping up from Ordinary Degrees to Honors Degrees)<br><br>2. how you treat APL from higher level awards (so if a student already had<br>an Honours Degree or Masters, would you allow it to count towards a further<br>Honours Degree?) [...] Jisc Netskills 2014-09-09T16:45:08+01:00 2014-09-09T16:45:08+01:00 Netskills Autumn Programme goes live! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;36a7b1f0.1409 Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;36a7b1f0.1409">Netskills Autumn Programme goes live! </a> Emma Hollands 2014-08-04T08:59:05+00:00 2014-08-04T08:59:05+00:00 Short Courses at the SSC, University of Reading, UK (September 2014) https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;80219ea6.1408 We are re-announcing the following short courses, which are scheduled to take place at the Statistical Services Centre in September 2014. Summary information is given below. For more detailed information and registration forms please see http://www.reading.ac.uk/ssc/, providing your address and/or fax number, or email statistics-courses@lists.reading.ac.uk.<br><br>Note<br>******If you would like to discuss the possibility of hosting one, or more, of the public courses below at your institution, please contact us****** [...] Tanner, Jonathan 2 2014-07-08T12:59:33+00:00 2014-07-08T12:59:33+00:00 Faculty / School Restructuring https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;90ae1370.1407 Dear all,<br><br>London South Bank University is currently undergoing a major restructuring and reorganisation. The university is moving from a four faculty to seven school structure. The current faculty administration support structure is being reviewed to fit it to the new structure.<br><br>Is there anyone working outside the M25 who has been through a similar restructuring, either from faculty to school or visa-versa who would be willing to host a visit from a group of LSBU administrative staff and managers so that we can pick up some tips on fitting support services into our new structure? [...] Jisc Netskills 2014-06-23T16:06:29+01:00 2014-06-23T16:06:29+01:00 e-Learning Essentials in London - Last chance to book https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;38d30a71.1406 Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;38d30a71.1406">e-Learning Essentials in London - Last chance to book </a> Emma Hollands 2014-06-17T14:02:28+00:00 2014-06-17T14:02:28+00:00 Short Courses at the SSC, University of Reading, UK (September 2014) https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;699dafcd.1406 Following another successful run of our Statistics for University Administrators short course, at the London School of Economics, we are re-announcing the next run of this course. It is scheduled to take place, again, at the Statistical Services Centre in September, together with a number of related short courses. Summary information is given below. For more detailed information and registration forms please see http://www.reading.ac.uk/ssc/, providing your address and/or fax number, or email statistics-courses@lists.reading.ac.uk. [...] Jisc Netskills 2014-06-06T09:44:17+01:00 2014-06-06T09:44:17+01:00 Harness The Power of CSS with Netskills https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;a9f8e0d7.1406 Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;a9f8e0d7.1406">Harness The Power of CSS with Netskills </a> Lundbeck, Alison 2014-05-30T14:14:57+00:00 2014-05-30T14:14:57+00:00 Academic Profiling system https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;872f1a31.1405 Hello,<br><br>I was wondering if anyone has any experience with Vidatum Technologies (www.vidatum.com<http://www.vidatum.com/>) research and grant management system? The key feature seems to be pulling information into (web) profiles: "Our solution is web-based and provides institutions with a single source of information on researchers, publications, funding and collaboration. From the academic's perspective it allows them to create and manage their own profiles and publish them online to a global audience." [...] Clare Foyle 2014-05-21T13:22:43+01:00 2014-05-21T13:22:43+01:00 Timetabling and room audits https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;2eb8332c.1405 Dear all,<br><br>I'd be really grateful if you could consider these questions about room use within your institution, or forward these questions to colleagues that undertake room booking duties. If you could respond to me directly (off list), I'll be happy to collate replies and share with the forum as a whole. [...] Jisc Netskills 2014-05-13T14:11:20+01:00 2014-05-13T14:11:20+01:00 Digital Storytelling Masterclass returns to Newcastle https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;b2f21f6d.1405 Digital Storytelling Masterclass: BTEC Certificate<br>Date: 10th \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 13th June 2014<br>Location: Netskills, Newcastle<br>http://bit.ly/OzN6HE<br><br>Over three days our trainers will guide you through writing a script, all the way to producing a video. You\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdll also find out how to capture or find images that help your story truly resonate with your audience.<br><br>You\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdll learn how stories are constructed, and gain the skills that allow you to combine images with sound that grab people\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds attention with a truly affecting story. Summary information is given below. For more detailed information and registration forms please see http://www.reading.ac.uk/ssc/, providing your address and/or fax number, or email statistics-courses@lists.reading.ac.uk.<br><br>Note<br>******All of our courses include hands-on computer practical work****** [...] Jisc Netskills 2014-04-25T09:50:11+01:00 2014-04-25T09:50:11+01:00 Netskills Podcasting - A Practical Guide https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;f2fa8836.1404 Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=admin-staff;f2fa8836.1404">Netskills Podcasting - A Practical Guide </a>
